SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Car
Represents a unit of a car in the system.
CarInventory
CarInventory class is responsible for managing the collection of recorded Car objects in the local database and performing various operations related to them.
CarReport
Represents a report item for a Car.
CarTableModel
 
IReportTableModel<T>
 
MainForm
 
Rental
Represents a rental transaction for a Car.
RentalReport
Represents a report for a rental, including information about the rental duration and its current status (active or inactive).
RentalReport.RentalStatus
Enum representing the rental status.
RentalService
The RentalService class is responsible for managing rental operations including fetching recorded Rental objects from the local database, checking car availability, and generating rental reports.
RentalTableModel
 
RentDateVerifier
